name: Slate
text:
"I put my sad face emoji on this person's post, and now I'm done... we have this temptation to not say anything at all."

How do you comfort a grieving person without making things worse? Find out on this week's #HowToPod. Stream it now on @ApplePodcasts: https://t.co/WKn6mfACCu https://t.co/FkO298pSQM
